mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_no AS deptNo, d.dept_name AS deptName, d.parent_dept_no AS parentDeptNo FROM tbl_department d WHERE d.dept_active = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM tbl_employee e WHERE e.fk_dept_no = d.dept_no AND e.emp_status = '재직' ) ORDER BY d.dept_no

SELECT e.emp_no AS empNo, e.emp_name AS empName, e.fk_dept_no AS deptNo, r.rank_name AS rankName, r.rank_level AS rankLevel, e.emp_status AS empStatus, e.emp_save_filename AS empSaveFilename, ( SELECT LISTAGG(p.position_name, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY p.position_no) FROM tbl_employee_position ep JOIN tbl_position p ON p.position_no = ep.fk_position_no WHERE ep.fk_emp_no = e.emp_no ) AS positions FROM tbl_employee e JOIN tbl_rank r ON r.rank_no = e.fk_rank_no JOIN tbl_department d ON d.dept_no = e.fk_dept_no AND d.dept_active = 'Y' WHERE e.emp_status = '재직' AND e.fk_dept_no IS NOT NULL ORDER BY e.fk_dept_no, r.rank_level ASC, e.hiredate ASC, e.emp_no
